orchestral-large-ensemble.title: dying your dying to come closer
orchestral-large-ensemble.instrumentation: 6 voices, flute, clarinet, violin, viola, cello, Celtic harp, electric guitar (re-fretted L. Harrison); ~40'
orchestral-large-ensemble.description:
for EXAUDI/EXPLORE
This piece searches for the in-between spaces where opposing elements corrade together, like form/formlessness, cycle/change, sound/language, story/poetry, return/evolve, destruction/empathy, pattern/dissolution.

orchestral-large-ensemble.title: the being/the world
orchestral-large-ensemble.description: The world's poetic force (its energy), kept alive within us, fastens itself by fleeting, delicate shivers, onto the rambling prescience of poetry in the depths of our being.

orchestral-large-ensemble.title: portions transparent/opaque
orchestral-large-ensemble.dedication: for BBC Scottish Symphony Orchestra and Ilan Volkov
orchestral-large-ensemble.description:
1. skin/shimmer (2014) string orchestra (16,14,12,10,8); ~15'
2. bone/saturate (2023) string orchestra + full brass ensemble (4,3,3,1); ~12'
3. nerve/cluster (2023) string orchestra/full brass/full winds (3,3,3,3); ~9'

orchestral-large-ensemble.title: interius/exterius
orchestral-large-ensemble.instrumentation: bass flute, oboe, accordion, viola, cello, two double basses, harp, dulcimer; 40'
orchestral-large-ensemble.description: We have suggested that Relation is an open totality evolving upon itself.

orchestral-large-ensemble.title: modi in cascada
orchestral-large-ensemble.dedication: for A Filetta and Ensemble Resonanz
orchestral-large-ensemble.description: premiere performance WDR Funkhaus KÃ¶ln, 21st August, 2022

orchestral-large-ensemble.title: prisma interius V
orchestral-large-ensemble.instrumentation: harp, clarinet, wine glasses, synthesizer, and string ensemble (14); 15'

orchestral-large-ensemble.title: orbis ascendentes
orchestral-large-ensemble.description: for the Julien Weiss Prototype 9 Qanun and ensemble

orchestral-large-ensemble.title: dilations
orchestral-large-ensemble.instrumentation: 3 upper range male voices, 3 cellos, and 3 bass clarinets; ~40'

ensemble.title: FADENSONNEN (Paul Celan)
ensemble.description: What is sadness and grief on a scale so large and unimaginable, any sensitive human has a danger of drowning in it?

ensemble.title: elemental overlay studies for dance
ensemble.description: an open-scored piece exploring the potentiality of music happening alongside dance

ensemble.title: cyclic overlay studies
ensemble.description: ongoing development of musical vocal exercises for vocalists enjoying time together in various numbers

ensemble.title: center/periphery
ensemble.instrumentation: 5+ mid/low sustaining instrumentalists with optional synthesizer

ensemble.description: is an exploration in the kinetic energy occurring between the atmospheric agents

ensemble.title: a medial line
